page.title: 10LIFE STYLES ; DALTON
page.content: Not everyone likes{Dalton.}It is quite a big area with{one big block}of {houses}divided up into{five different streets. Some of the people treat it like a{dump}and throw their{rubbish } onto the streets. The{walls}are all {written on}with marker pens and paint. All the{windows}are{smashed}in the houses, where people have moved out. A lot of people own{dogs}and these are always{fighting}in the streets. There is lots of{trouble,} sometimes there are{fires}and sometimes{fights}outside{"The Grapes"} public house and the{police}have to come. The{best thing}about the area is the nearby village of{Dalton Parva,}it is{smart}and{clean}there with a small {church, school}and{several fields. }
